div.div: Univ. of La Verne vs. Univ. of Redlands
at Redlands, CA | Ted Runner Stadium

tr.td: Coin toss: Redlands won the toss and will receive.
Alex Miller kickoff 59 yards to the UR6, Devin Appleton return 13 yards to the UR19 (Austin Boggan).
Kevin Russell pass complete to James Ramirez for 32 yards to the ULV49, 1ST DOWN UR (Sean Komendat).
Curtis Tanquary rush for 3 yards to the ULV46 (Quinn Goldman;A. Arguello).
